00023   template <class K, class D>
00024   class BinnedVector {
00025   public:
00031     BinnedVector();
00040     BinnedVector(const unsigned int N, const K &minRange, const K &maxRange, const D &initValue);
00049     void setBinning(const unsigned int N, const K &minRange, const K &maxRange, const D &initValue);
00056     D& operator [] (const K& position);
00063     const D& operator [] (const K& position) const;
00069     void clear();
00078     const std::vector<D>& getVector() const {return _data;}
00087     std::vector<K> getBinCenters() const;
00088 
00089   private:
00090 
00091     unsigned int getIndex(const K& position) const;
00092 
00093     K _binWidth;
00094     K _minRange;
00095     K _maxRange;
00096     unsigned int _N;
00097     std::vector<D> _data;
00098 
00099     D _default;
00100   };

00102   template <class K, class D>
00103   BinnedVector<K,D>::BinnedVector() {
00104   }
00105 
00106   template <class K, class D>
00107   BinnedVector<K,D>::BinnedVector(const unsigned int N, const K &minRange, const K &maxRange, const D &initValue) {
00108     setBinning(N, minRange, maxRange, initValue);
00109   }
00110 
00111   template <class K, class D>
00112   void BinnedVector<K,D>::clear() {
00113 
00114     _data.clear();
00115     _data.resize(_N+2,_default);
00116 
00117   }
00118 
00119   template <class K, class D>
00120   void BinnedVector<K,D>::setBinning(const unsigned int N, const K &minRange, const K &maxRange, const D &initValue) {
00121 
00122     _default = initValue;
00123 
00124     _minRange = minRange;
00125     _maxRange = maxRange;
00126     _N = N;
00127 
00128     _binWidth = (_maxRange-_minRange)/(double)_N;
00129 
00130     streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "binning: " << _N << " bins between " << _minRange << " and " << _maxRange << " which is a bin width of " << _binWidth<< std::endl;
00131 
00132     clear();
00133   }
00134 
00135   template <class K, class D>
00136   unsigned int BinnedVector<K,D>::getIndex(const K& position) const {
00137     unsigned int index = 0;
00138     if (position >= _minRange) index = (unsigned int)((position - _minRange)/_binWidth) + 1;
00139     if (index > _N) index = _N+1;
00140 
00141     streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"requesting element for " << position << " which is mapped to bin " << index << std::endl;
00142     if (index >= _data.size() ) streamlog_out(ERROR) <<"requesting element for " << position << "which is mapped to non existing bin " << index << std::endl;
00143 
00144     return index;
00145   }
00146 
00147   template <class K, class D>
00148   D& BinnedVector<K,D>::operator [] (const K& position) {
00149     return _data[getIndex(position)];
00150   }
00151 
00152   template <class K, class D>
00153   const D& BinnedVector<K,D>::operator [] (const K& position) const {
00154     return _data[getIndex(position)];
00155   }
00156 
00157   template <class K, class D>
00158   std::vector<K> BinnedVector<K,D>::getBinCenters() const {
00159     std::vector<K> binCenters;
00160     for (unsigned int i=0; i<_N+2;++i) {
00161       binCenters.push_back(_minRange + _binWidth * ( (K)i - 0.5));
00162     }
00163     return binCenters;
00164   }
00165 }
